Question: Which Alg?
Range: Connected | Cycle | MSTKruskal | MSTPrim | Number | ShortestPath | StrongConnect

Question: Which Gtp?
Constraint/Rule: if (Alg.Connected) {Gtp = Undirected;Src = true;}if (Alg.StrongConnect) {Gtp = Directed;Src* = DFS;}if (!(!Alg.MSTKruskal && !Alg.MSTPrim)) {Gtp = Undirected;Wgt = Weighted;}if (Alg.ShortestPath) {Gtp = Directed;Wgt = Weighted;}
